app.title: DeepSeek Chat Assistant
app.description: Intelligent chat application based on micro-frontend architecture

settings.title: API Settings
settings.help: Please visit DeepSeek website to get API Key

connection.insecure: HTTPS connection recommended for data security

clearMessages.title: Clear Chat History
clearMessages.description: Delete all locally saved chat messages while keeping API Key settings
clearMessages.message: This will delete all chat messages but keep your API Key settings. This action cannot be undone.

clearApiKey.title: Delete API Key
clearApiKey.description: Remove locally stored API Key, reconfiguration required to use chat features
clearApiKey.message: This will delete your API Key. You'll need to reconfigure it to continue using chat features.

cleanup.title: Clean Expired Data
cleanup.description: Delete all expired local data to free up storage space
cleanup.message: This will delete all expired local data. Normal data will not be affected.

clearAll.title: Clear All Data
clearAll.description: Delete all locally stored data including API Key, chat history, and app settings
clearAll.message: This will delete all local data including API Key, chat history, and app settings. This action cannot be undone and the app will refresh.

validation.inputTooLong: Input too long, please limit to 2000 characters
validation.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests, please try again later

home.title: Welcome to DeepSeek Chat Assistant
home.subtitle: Modern chat application based on micro-frontend architecture
